original_text: the good thing -- the only good thing -- about extreme ops is that it's so inane that it gave me plenty of time to ponder my thanksgiving to-do list .
generated_text:
1. "The only redeeming quality of 'The Last Airbender' is that it's so poorly made that I had time to think about what I'm going to eat for lunch."
2. "The sole positive aspect of 'Battlefield Earth' is that its sheer awfulness allowed me to mentally plan my next vacation."
